Byelobog | website=[http://www.burzum.org burzum.org] [http://www.thuleanperspective.com thuleanperspective.com] | members= | formermembers=Varg Vikernes - all instruments }} '''Burzum''' is a black metal project started by Varg Vikernes in 1991 that pioneered in the early Norwegian black metal scene. The name ''[[Burzum]]'' is in the [[Black Speech]], meaning "darkness". ==Discography== ===Full-length albums=== {| class="wikitable" |- !Title !Recorded !Released |- |''Burzum''||January 1992||March 1992 |- |''Det som engang var''||April 1992||August 1993 |- |''Hvis lyset tar oss''||September 1992||May 1994 |- |''Filosofem''||March 1993||January 1996 |- |''Dauði Baldrs''||1994-1995 (in prison)||October 1997 |- |''Hliðskjálf''||1998 (in prison)||April 1999 |- |''Belus''||2010||March 2010 |- |''Fallen''||2010||March 2011 |- |''Umskiptar''||September 2011||May 2012 |- |''Sôl austan, Mâni vestan''||2012||May 2013 |- |''The Ways of Yore''||2013-2014||June 2014 |- |''Thulêan Mysteries''||2020||March 2020 |} ===EPs=== *''Aske'' (1993) ===Demos/promos=== *''Burzum (Demo I)'' (1991) *''Burzum (Demo II)'' (1991) *''Burzum (Promo)'' (1992) ===Compilation albums=== *''Burzum / Aske'' (1995) *''1992-1997'' (1998) *''Anthology'' (2002) *''Draugen'' (2005) *''Lord of Darkness Anthology'' (2008) *''From the Depths of Darkness'' (2011) {{title}} [[Category:Bands]] [[Category:Black metal]]
